unnormalised: Hey folks! Heard the one about the NH44 stretch between Delhi and Chandigarh? Massive traffic jam reported since 7 AM today! Apparently, some road construction near Karnal is causing a bottleneck.
normalised: Hey folks! Heard the one about the N-H-forty four stretch between Delhi and Chandigarh? Massive traffic jam reported since seven A-M today! Apparently, some road construction near Karnal is causing a bottleneck.

unnormalised: Sources say the delay could be anywhere from 2-3 hours. Bhai, imagine missing your early morning flight because of this! The highway authorities are advising travelers to take alternative routes, maybe via NH152D? Anyone got any real-time updates?
normalised: Sources say the delay could be anywhere from two to three hours. Bhai, imagine missing your early morning flight because of this! The highway authorities are advising travelers to take alternative routes, maybe via N-H-one hundred and fifty two D? Anyone got any real-time updates?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, buses plying this route, like the Haryana Roadways Volvo, are running way behind schedule. Passengers are stuck, some complaining about the heat with no AC. One traveler tweeted that he hasn’t had chai since 6 AM! Talk about a disaster.
normalised: Meanwhile, buses plying this route, like the Haryana Roadways Volvo, are running way behind schedule. Passengers are stuck, some complaining about the heat with no A-C. One traveler tweeted that he hasn’t had chai since six A-M! Talk about a disaster.

unnormalised: Police are on the scene trying to manage the chaos, but it’s slow going. Remember those toll booths? Expect even longer queues there! So if you are planning to hit the road towards Chandigarh, prepone your journey, or maybe just chill at home and catch a movie.
normalised: Police are on the scene trying to manage the chaos, but it’s slow going. Remember those toll booths? Expect even longer queues there! So if you are planning to hit the road towards Chandigarh, prepone your journey, or maybe just chill at home and catch a movie.

unnormalised: Stay safe and drive carefully! And for god's sake, carry extra water and snacks. This could be a long ride! Will update if I hear more deets about the jam easing up.
normalised: Stay safe and drive carefully! And for god's sake, carry extra water and snacks. This could be a long ride! Will update if I hear more deets about the jam easing up.
